text: Ne basoomele amakhuwa ka Nuhu, alwa yaboolela Abandu bebe mbu, “Enywe Abandu banje, nikali mbu okhwikhala khwanje ninanyu nende okhubetsulisia khwanje ebimanyisio bia Nyasaye khubasinyile.(manye mbu) esie ndisichile Nyasaye, kho enywe khung’asie amakhuwa kenyu nende abiamutsokasinjia bienyu mana likhuwa lienyu lia mubusia libe habulafu, mana mumbusilie okhumala ne mulambelesia obwiyangu tawe
